articles.title: Ancient human DNA helps explain why northern Europeans have higher multiple sclerosis risk - CBS News
articles.description: The findings come from a huge project to compare modern DNA with that culled from ancient humans' teeth and bones.
articles.content: Ancient DNA helps explain why northern Europeans have a higher risk of multiple sclerosis than other ancestries: It's a genetic legacy of horseback-riding cattle herders who swept into the region abo… [+3696 chars]
